Opis i program putovanja: Description and program of the trip
ako ste čekirali Zadrži stare slike, mož: if you checked Keep old images, you can add new images without deleting previous ones
Istekla mogucnost rezervacije: The possibility of reservation has expired
Ulogujte se da biste izvršili rezervacij: Log in to make a reservation
Popunjavati samo za izlete-putovanja bez: To be filled only for excursions-trips without overnight stays
mi smo turisticka agencija koja posluje: we are a travel agency operating in Serbia. The agency was established to provide interesting trips for everyone's pocket, to bring the beauty of the world closer to you
Zahvaljujemo vam na dosadašnjem poverenj: We thank you for your trust so far, in the hope that we will continue to travel together
Šta naši putnici kazu o nama: What our travelers say about us
Da biste ostavili recenziju morate imati: You must have reservations to leave a review
Utisak se odnosi na putovanje: The impression is about the journey
Feedback se moze ostaviti samo za realiz: Feedback can only be left for realized trips
Iz padajuceg menija izaberite neko od Va: From the drop-down menu, select one of your realized trips for which you want to leave a review
Koliko dana od kriranja vazi popust: How many days from the creation is the discount valid
Koliko dana do realizacije putovanja vaz: How many days until the realization of the trip is the discount valid
Broj mesta u hotelu: Number of seats in the hotel
Koliko dana pre putovanja je LastMinute: How many days before the trip is LastMinute
Broj dana vazenja firstMinute: Number of days of validity of firstMinute
Pod nadimkom ce se pojavljivati Vasi kom: Your comments will appear under the nickname
Napišite nešto o sebi, ili citat ili dru: Write something about yourself, or a quote or whatever else you want to appear below your comment. This field is optional
Nema poruke za prikaz: There are no messages to display
2 (Rezervacija za sebe i jos jednu osobu: 2 (Reservation for yourself and one other person)
3 (Rezervacija za sebe i jos dve osobe): 3 (Reservation for yourself and two other people)
4 (Rezervacija za sebe i jos dve osobe): 4 (Rezervacija za sebe i jos dve osobe)
5 (Rezervacija za sebe i jos dve osobe): 5 (Reservation for yourself and two other people)
Sve sobe su 1/2 i 1/3. Ukoliko rezervise: All rooms are 1/2 and 1/3. If you make a reservation for 1 person, you will be assigned to a room based on available capacity
Pay attention to the number of free places. The reservation is only up to the number of available seats
Ako je slobodno 4 mesta a Vi pokusate da: If 4 places are free and you try to reserve 5, 4 places will be reserved
Svet je knjiga, a oni koji ne putuju pro: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page
Peek into the world of travel with Dve Laste. We make memories together
